name: MEC Fusion 4/3mm Wetsuit - Women's
description:
Make the curls off Tofino or Lawrencetown feel like Maui. This cold-weather wetsuit provides neck-to-ankle coverage. A combo of super-stretchy neoprene and expert patterning gives you a full range of motion. The unbeatable price lets you stock the Delica with more than budget noodles.4mm stretch neoprene provides, comfort and mobility.4mm skin panels on chest and back improve heat retention around your body core.Underarm panels are 3mm neoprene with spandex for unrestricted swimming or paddling.Internal anti-flush neck gasket and panel prevents the spine-chilling bellows effect.Taped inner cuffs ensure wrists and ankles won't bag out with age.Reinforced knees add abrasion resistance.Curved seams are glued and sealed, then reinforced at all critical points. No seam allowance keeps the inside surface smooth.#10 YKK back zipper with long pull cord and drain holes at bottom.Printed interior graphics with a collage of surf themes and the motto "Think warm thoughts."

Body fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering
